name: mssql-dxt
description: A Desktop Extension to interact with Microsoft SQL Server.

servers.title: SQL Server Configurations (JSON)
servers.description: Enter a JSON string representing an array of server configurations. Each configuration object in the array must have a unique 'name' property. Example: [{"name": "dev-db", "server_address": "localhost", "port": 1433, "database_name": "mydb", "authentication_method": "sql_server_authentication", "username": "sa", "password": "yourPassword!", "driver": "ODBC Driver 17 for SQL Server", "trust_server_certificate": false}, {"name": "prod-db", ...}]

tools.name: execute_query
tools.description: Executes a SQL query against the specified database server.

parameters.name: server_name
parameters.description: The name of the configured server connection to use.

tools.name: list_databases
tools.description: Lists all databases on the specified SQL server instance.

parameters.name: server_name
parameters.description: The name of the configured server connection to use.

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: Lists all tables in the current/specified database on the specified server.

parameters.name: server_name
parameters.description: The name of the configured server connection to use.

parameters.name: database_name
parameters.description: Optional: The name of the database to list tables from. If not provided, uses the default database for the connection.

tools.name: get_table_schema
tools.description: Gets the schema (columns, types) for a specified table on the specified server.

parameters.name: server_name
parameters.description: The name of the configured server connection to use.

parameters.name: schema_name
parameters.description: Optional: The schema of the table (e.g., 'dbo'). Defaults to 'dbo'.

parameters.name: database_name
parameters.description: Optional: The name of the database where the table resides. If not provided, uses the default database for the connection.
